description: Generate realistic mock answers for clarification questions about an NDIS incident report

participant_name.description: Name of the participant involved in the incident

reporter_name.description: Name of the staff member reporting the incident

phase.description: Phase of the incident (before, during, end, or post)

phase_narrative.description: The narrative text for the specified phase
phase_narrative.example: John was in the day room watching TV. He seemed quiet and was sitting alone.

questions.description: List of clarification questions to generate answers for

example.question: How did John seem when you first saw him?
